description: Contact responsible for creating the metadata record.
Contact responsible for uploading or transferring the digital object to TDIS.
Contact responsible for the quality and formatting of the digital object and its metadata to enable reuse.
Contact responsible for updating and maintaining versions of the digital object, often used for software.
Contact with responsibility for ensuring appropriate long-term stewardship of the digital object in terms of storage and management.
Contact controlling copyrights or other intellectual property rights over the digital object, responsible for determining licenses.
Contact with another role or responsibility toward the digital object.
